languages.text: While {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bulwark{/g} is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +<u>(stacks of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.
languages.original_text: Оплот стойкости предоставляет {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарду{/g} полное {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +(число уровней эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g}" / 2) к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от дистанционных атак.

traits.locale_text: While Bulwark is active, the Vanguard counts as full cover for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of unyielding beacon)/2 damage deflection against ranged attacks.
While Bulwark is active, the Vanguard counts as full cover for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of unyielding beacon)/2 damage deflection against ranged attacks.

While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

languages.text: {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Оплот стойкости{/g} предоставляет {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарду{/g} полное {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +<u>(число уровней эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g} / 2)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от дистанционных атак.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Оплот стойкости{/g} предоставляет {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарду{/g} полное {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +<u>(число уровней эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g} / 2)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от дистанционных атак.
Оплот стойкости предоставляет авангарду полное укрытие от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +(число знаков стойкости / 2) к отражению урона от дистанционных атак.

languages.text: 当{g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}坚若磐石{/g}效果激活时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}可以为盟友提供{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}效果。当相邻盟友受到远程攻击时，给予该盟友额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于<u>（{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}不灭明光{/g}层数/2）</u>。
languages.original_text: While {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bulwark{/g} is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +<u>(stacks of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: 当坚若磐石效果激活时，先锋可以为盟友提供全身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}效果。当相邻盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击时，给予该盟友额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于（不灭明光层数/2）。

当坚若磐石效果激活时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}可以为盟友提供{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}效果。当相邻盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击时，给予该盟友额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于（{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}层数/2）。

languages.text: Mientras {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bastión{/g} esté en vigor, se considera que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} proporciona {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura total{/g} a sus aliados y otorga a los aliados adyacentes +<u>(acumulaciones de {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Dechado de firmeza{/g} / 2)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra ataques a distancia.
languages.original_text: While {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bulwark{/g} is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +<u>(stacks of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: Mientras Bastión esté en vigor, se considera que el vanguardia proporciona {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g} total a sus aliados y otorga a los aliados adyacentes +(acumulaciones de Dechado de firmeza)/2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de daño contra ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}.

languages.text:
Solange {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bollwerk{/g} aktiv ist, zählt die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} für Ihre Verbündeten als volle {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und gewährt angrenzenden Verbündeten +<u>(Stapel von {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}/2)
</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}SchadensAblenkung{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g} gegen Fernkampfangriffe.
languages.original_text: While {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bulwark{/g} is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +<u>(stacks of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: So lange Bollwerk aktiv ist, zählt die Vorhut für Ihre Verbündeten als vollwertige {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckung{/g} und gewährt angrenzenden Verbündeten +(Stapel von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit)/2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Schadensdeflektion{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: Tant que {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Rempart{/g} est actif, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} est considéré comme une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g} pour ses alliés et il confère aux alliés adjacents un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +<u>(cumuls de {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Guide inflexible{/g} / 2)</u> contre les attaques à distance.
languages.original_text: While {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bulwark{/g} is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +<u>(stacks of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: Tant que Rempart est actif, le Patrouilleur est considéré comme une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g} totale pour ses alliés et il confère aux alliés adjacents un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des dégâts de +(cumuls de Guide Inflexible) / 2 contre les attaques à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g}.

languages.text: ブルワークが発動中、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は味方にとって{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全遮蔽物{/g}とみなされ、隣接する味方に遠隔攻撃に対して +({g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数 / 2)分の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: ブルワークが発動中、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は味方にとって{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全遮蔽物{/g}とみなされ、隣接する味方に遠隔攻撃に対して +({g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数 / 2)分の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を与える。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g}, {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Yıkılmaz Sur{/g} etkinken dost birimleri için {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}tam siper{/g} olarak kabul edilir ve bitişiğindeki dost birimlere menzilli saldırılara karşı +<u>({g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}yılmaz fener{/g} birikimi / 2)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazandırır.
languages.original_text: While {g|f:4a0836fc274b422c922d1327438b5847}Bulwark{/g} is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +<u>(stacks of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.
